comments.name: remarks
comments.value: Creates a new entity (e.g., a mob) at the specified location.

comments.name: identifier
comments.value: Identifier of the type of entity to spawn. If no namespace is specified, 'minecraft:' is assumed.

comments.name: location
comments.value: The location at which to create the entity.

comments.name: returns
comments.value: Newly created entity at the specified location.
